title: Healthy Eating on a Budget Articles
description: All articles about Healthy Eating on a Budget

articles.title: 10 High-Protein Snacks That Keep You Full Without Breaking the Bank
articles.author: Mike Rodriguez
articles.description: Tired of expensive protein bars that cost $3 each? I found 10 high protein snacks that actually fill you up for under $1 per serving. These healthy snacks saved me $200+ monthly.

articles.title: The Ultimate Beginner's Guide to Meal Prep Meals: Save Time, Eat Healthy, Spend Less
articles.author: Sarah Mitchell
articles.description: I failed at meal prep 3 times before figuring it out. Here's how to avoid my expensive mistakes and actually make meal prep work for busy people who want healthy meals without the stress.

articles.title: No-Cook Budget Meals for When You're Too Tired to Cook (or Don't Have a Stove): 7 Lifesaving Recipes Under $3 Each
articles.author: Maria Santos
articles.description: Whether it's heat, laziness, or no kitchen — this is your fix. After 3 months with a broken stove and a $50/week food budget, here are 7 no-cook meals that saved my sanity and wallet.

articles.title: 7-Day Budget Meal Plan for Under $50 (I Ate This for 3 Months When Money Was Tight)
articles.author: Maria Santos
articles.description: Grocery prices are insane, but you can still eat well on $50/week. This is the exact meal plan I used for 3 months when money was tight—real recipes, real prices, real food that doesn't taste like punishment.
